summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness against the General Road and Bridge Fund on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of 4th Avenue South et al, from Holgate Street to Spokane Street, by Grading, etc., as provided for in Ordinance No. 40801, creating Local Improvement District No. 3289, and appropriating money therefor.
